类型: Color: 2 Pack C1c4 Black Frame/Tortoise Frame
评论详情: I recently purchased these 90s vibes tortoise-colored frames, and I couldn't be happier! 😍 At first, I was a bit hesitant about how they would fit my round face, but I took the plunge, and they turned out to be absolutely perfect. Plus, the quality is impressive—sturdy yet lightweight, making them comfortable for all-day wear.  If you're on the fence about these frames because of your face shape, trust me, they work beautifully for everyone! I’ve received so many compliments, and I can confidently say they’re a must-have accessory for anyone looking to channel those nostalgic 90s vibes. Highly recommend! 🌟

评论概述: Not for everyone, perfect for me.
类型: Color: 2 Pack-c1c2 Black Frame/Tortoise Frame
评论详情: Let me start off with the fact that I do not have a face that pulls off sunglasses very well. My nose is a bit crooked so I like my sunglasses to be pushed down enough so that my nose looks smaller and I feel like my head is a bit larger than the average (my mom would say otherwise). These glasses make me feel so classy and cool. And they make my nose look small without having to push them down to the point where it’s annoying to look out of them (iykyk). And! They’re polarized (and affordable)! If you have a smaller head or are used to sunglasses making you look like a bug I would not recommend these, but if you have similar features to mind I would buy them asap. I rarely write reviews but I’ve been looking for cute sunglasses for forever and the war is finally over, so naturally I had to let the public know.  P.S. the tortious glasses with green shades look dark black from the outside but when you’re wearing them they definitely make your world look green and film-like (another win in my opinion).
